FuncDef:
The renewal-time command configures the renewal time of IP addresses.
The undo renewal-time command restores the default setting.
By default, the renewal time of an IP address is 50% of the lease of the IP address pool.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of days for IP address renewal.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 999.

Specifies the number of hours for IP address renewal.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 23.

Specifies the number of minutes for IP address renewal.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 59.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The renewal time of an IP address must be shorter than the lease of the IP address pool and the rebinding time of the IP address.
If the value of renewal time is set to 0 after the renewal-time command is configured, the value of renewal time restores the default value. If the renewal-time command is not configured, setting the value of renewal time to 0 is meaningless.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
